summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to fire-resistive requirements for roofs in buildings of Type I and Type II construction, amending Sections 1801, 1802, 1901 and 1902 of the Building Code (Ordinance 85500), repealing Sections 1806 and 1906 thereof, and adding thereto in lieu of those repealed, new sections designated Sections 1806 and 1906.
